channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Very Simple Breadcrumb
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Very Simple Breadcrumb

item.title: CVE-2022-2149|2024-08-03T00:24:44.276Z -- unknown -- very%20simple%20breadcrumb
item.description: The Very Simple Breadcrumb WordPress plugin through 1.0 does not sanitise and escape its settings, allowing high privilege users such as admin to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed.
